prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a blue shell and unique claw features.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a crustacean and has a vibrant blue color scheme.
Generate a Pokemon design inspired by marine life with striking blue and yellow accents.
Make a Pokemon that has a large, clawed arm and is primarily blue in color.
Imagine a water-type Pokemon with distinctive features like a large, armored shell.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a giant crab and has a fierce expression.
Show me a Pokemon that combines aquatic and claw-like attributes in its design.
